nodes.name: BLS

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) view returns (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory)
function (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory,uint256) view returns (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory)
function (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory) pure returns (bytes memory)

nodes.documentation: @dev Creates a signature over message using the provided secret key.
nodes.name: sign

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory)
function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory)
function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct AltBn128.G2Point memory)
function (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory,struct AltBn128.G2Point memory,struct AltBn128.G1Point memory,struct AltBn128.G2Point memory) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Verify performs the pairing operation to check if the signature
is correct for the provided message and the corresponding public key.
Public key must be a valid point on G2 curve in an uncompressed format.
Message must be a valid point on G1 curve in an uncompressed format.
Signature must be a valid point on G1 curve in an uncompressed format.
nodes.name: verify

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) view returns (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory)
function (struct AltBn128.G1Point memory) pure returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@dev VerifyBytes wraps the functionality of BLS.verify, but hashes a message
to a point on G1 and marshal to bytes first to allow raw bytes verification.
nodes.name: verifyBytes

devdoc.details: Library for verification of 2-pairing-check BLS signatures, including basic, aggregated, or reconstructed threshold BLS signatures, generated using the AltBn128 curve.

sign(bytes,uint256).details: Creates a signature over message using the provided secret key.

verify(bytes,bytes,bytes).details: Verify performs the pairing operation to check if the signature is correct for the provided message and the corresponding public key. Public key must be a valid point on G2 curve in an uncompressed format. Message must be a valid point on G1 curve in an uncompressed format. Signature must be a valid point on G1 curve in an uncompressed format.

verifyBytes(bytes,bytes,bytes).details: VerifyBytes wraps the functionality of BLS.verify, but hashes a message to a point on G1 and marshal to bytes first to allow raw bytes verification.

devdoc.title: BLS signatures verification
